english.segment1: Verse (x3): Our God is an awesome God. He reigns from heaven above. With wisdom, power, and love. Our God is an awesome God
english.segment2: Bridge: He reigns, yes He reigns (He reigns, yes He reigns). He reigns, yes He reigns (He's an awesome God). He reigns, yes He reigns (He reigns, yes He reigns). He reigns, yes He reigns (He's an awesome God). He reigns supreme over heaven and earth (He reigns, yes He reigns). He reigns over heaven and earth say (He's an awesome god). He reigns, yes He reigns (He reigns, yes He reigns). He reigns, yes He reigns (He's an awesome God)
english.segment3: Repeat Verse (x2): Our God is an awesome God. He reigns from heaven above. With wisdom, power, and love. Our God is an awesome God
english.segment4: Bridge (x3): He reigns, yes He reigns (He reigns, yes He reigns). He reigns, yes He reigns (He's an awesome God). He reigns, yes He reigns (He reigns, yes He reigns). He reigns, yes He reigns (He's an awesome God)
